channel.title: How Do You Add ::dice To Commands
channel.description: Hello I was just wondering what was the command for ::dice, or how do i add that command so that it would appear over your head with the percentile it rolled? Thanks

item.title: How Do You Add ::dice To Commands
item.dc:creator: @abk14101 abk14101
item.description:
@abk14101 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dice")) { int dice = (misc.random(100)); yell(""+playerName+" has just rolled @red@"+dice+" @bla@on their percentile dice!"); plrText = "I rolled a "+dice+" on my percentile dice!"; }

This is the code you add to your client just search “if(command” and add you command to the bottom

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Add ::dice To Commands
